cause.description:
This group is devoted to a man that has changed lives and performed countless miracles throughout his life, enriching the lives of others. We need to spread the word that the new savior has come to cleanse the corruption of the mortal world.
1. Chandler Carr is the second son of God
2. Chandler is the true savior.
3. To save ourselves, we must follow the savior.
cause.mission: Enlighten others of the reincarnation of God.
cause.name: Spread the Word of the New Jesus: Chandler Carr
